name: Full Adder
info: A Full Adder is a Half Adder with an additional input called the CARRY IN. The Full Adder is structured like two Half Adders after eachother.
desc: 2 is only on if either A and B, A and C or B and C is on. 1 is only on if either A, B or C is on. If A, B and C is on, both 1 and 2 is on.
winDesc: A calculator is born! A bit of info: C in this case is what's called 'Carry In', and is usually connected to another full-adder so you can add bigger numbers.
